sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO ITEM(ITEM_GROUP_CODE, ITEM_CODE, BRAND_CODE, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_SIZE, ITEM_SUMMARY_INFO, ITEM_DETAIL_INFO, ITEM_INGREDIENT, ITEM_HOW_TO_USE, ITEM_SELL_MAXNUM, ITEM_RELEASE_DATE, ITEM_PIC_PATH, ITEM_PIC_ORGNAME, ITEM_PIC_SAVENAME, ITEM_PIC_SIZE, REG_ID, REG_DATE, REG_IP, UPD_ID, UPD_DATE, UPD_IP) VALUES(CONCAT("IG",LPAD((SELECT GET_SEQ('ITEM_GROUP_CODE')), 10, '0')), CONCAT("IT",LPAD((SELECT GET_SEQ('ITEM_CODE')), 10, '0')), #brandCode#, #itemName#, #itemSize#, #itemSummaryInfo#, #itemDetailInfo#, #itemIngredient#, #itemHowToUse#, #itemSellMaxNum#, #itemReleaseDate#, #itemMainPicPath#, #itemMainPicOrgName#, #itemMainPicSaveName#, #itemMainPicSize#, #regId#, sysdate(), #regIp#, #updId#, sysdate(), #updIp#)

INSERT INTO ITEM(ITEM_GROUP_CODE, ITEM_CODE, BRAND_CODE, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_SIZE, ITEM_SUMMARY_INFO, ITEM_DETAIL_INFO, ITEM_INGREDIENT, ITEM_HOW_TO_USE, ITEM_SELL_MAXNUM, ITEM_RELEASE_DATE, ITEM_PIC_PATH, ITEM_PIC_ORGNAME, ITEM_PIC_SAVENAME, ITEM_PIC_SIZE, REG_ID, REG_DATE, REG_IP, UPD_ID, UPD_DATE, UPD_IP) VALUES(CONCAT("IG", LPAD((SELECT ID FROM SEQUENCE WHERE SEQ_NAME = 'ITEM_GROUP_CODE'), 10, '0')), CONCAT("IT", LPAD((SELECT ID FROM SEQUENCE WHERE SEQ_NAME = 'ITEM_CODE'), 10, '0')), #brandCode#, #itemName#, #itemSize#, #itemSummaryInfo#, #itemDetailInfo#, #itemIngredient#, #itemHowToUse#, #itemSellMaxNum#, #itemReleaseDate#, #itemMainPicPath#, #itemMainPicOrgName#, #itemMainPicSaveName#, #itemMainPicSize#, #regId#, sysdate(), #regIp#, #updId#, sysdate(), #updIp#)

INSERT INTO ITEM_STOCK(STOCK_CODE, ITEM_CODE, STOCK_MARKET_PRICE, STOCK_SELL_PRICE, STOCK_PURCHASE_PRICE, STOCK_MANUFACTURE_DATE, STOCK_EXPIRE_DATE, STOCK_AMOUNT) VALUES(CONCAT("ST", LPAD((SELECT ID FROM SEQUENCE WHERE SEQ_NAME='STOCK_CODE'), 10, '0')), CONCAT("IT", LPAD((SELECT ID FROM SEQUENCE WHERE SEQ_NAME='ITEM_CODE'), 10, '0')), #itemMarketPrice#, #itemSellPrice#, #itemPurchasePrice#, #itemManufactureDate#, #itemExpireDate#, #itemStockAmount#)
INSERT INTO ITEM_CATEGORY(ITEM_GROUP_CODE, CATEGORY3_CODE) VALUES(CONCAT("IG", LPAD((SELECT ID FROM SEQUENCE WHERE SEQ_NAME = 'ITEM_GROUP_CODE'), 10, '0')), #itemCategoryValue#)
INSERT INTO ITEM_FEATURE(ITEM_GROUP_CODE, FEATURE2_CODE) VALUES(CONCAT("IG", LPAD((SELECT ID FROM SEQUENCE WHERE SEQ_NAME = 'ITEM_GROUP_CODE'), 10, '0')), #itemFeatureValue#)

INSERT INTO ITEM_PIC(ITEM_PIC_CODE, ITEM_GROUP_CODE, ITEM_PIC_PATH, ITEM_PIC_ORGNAME, ITEM_PIC_SAVENAME, ITEM_PIC_SIZE, REG_ID, REG_DATE, REG_IP, UPD_ID, UPD_DATE, UPD_IP) VALUES(CONCAT("IP", LPAD((SELECT ID as seq FROM SEQUENCE WHERE SEQ_NAME = 'ITEM_PIC_CODE'), 10, '0')), CONCAT("IG", LPAD((SELECT ID as seq FROM SEQUENCE WHERE SEQ_NAME = 'ITEM_GROUP_CODE'), 10, '0')), #itemDetailPicPath#, #itemDetailPicOrgName#, #itemDetailPicSaveName#, #itemDetailPicSize#, #regId#, sysdate(), #regIp#, #updId#, sysdate(), #updIp#)
sqlMap.select: SELECT CATEGORY1_CODE as category1Code, CATEGORY1_NAME as category1Name FROM CATEGORY1

SELECT CATEGORY1.CATEGORY1_CODE as category1Code, CATEGORY1.CATEGORY1_NAME as category1Name, CATEGORY2.CATEGORY2_CODE as category2Code, CATEGORY2.CATEGORY2_NAME as category2Name FROM CATEGORY2, CATEGORY1 WHERE CATEGORY2.CATEGORY1_CODE = CATEGORY1.CATEGORY1_CODE

SELECT CATEGORY1.CATEGORY1_CODE as category1Code, CATEGORY1.CATEGORY1_NAME as category1Name, CATEGORY2.CATEGORY2_CODE as category2Code, CATEGORY2.CATEGORY2_NAME as category2Name, CATEGORY3.CATEGORY3_CODE as category3Code, CATEGORY3.CATEGORY3_NAME as category3Name FROM CATEGORY3, CATEGORY2, CATEGORY1 WHERE CATEGORY3.CATEGORY2_CODE = CATEGORY2.CATEGORY2_CODE AND CATEGORY2.CATEGORY1_CODE = CATEGORY1.CATEGORY1_CODE;
SELECT FEATURE1_CODE as feature1Code, FEATURE1_NAME as feature1Name FROM FEATURE1

SELECT FEATURE1.FEATURE1_CODE as feature1Code, FEATURE1.FEATURE1_NAME as feature1Name, FEATURE2.FEATURE2_CODE as feature2Code, FEATURE2.FEATURE2_NAME as feature2Name FROM FEATURE2, FEATURE1 WHERE FEATURE2.FEATURE1_CODE = FEATURE1.FEATURE1_CODE
